description: Group profiles represent groups of Amazon DataZone users. Groups can be manually created, or mapped to Active Directory groups of enterprise customers. In Amazon DataZone, groups serve two purposes. First, a group can map to a team of users in the organizational chart, and thus reduce the administrative work of a Amazon DataZone project owner when there are new employees joining or leaving a team. Second, corporate administrators use Active Directory groups to manage and update user statuses and so Amazon DataZone domain administrators can use these group memberships to implement Amazon DataZone domain policies.

GroupProfileStatus.description: The status of the group profile.
GroupProfileStatus.markdownDescription:
The status of the group profile.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ASSIGNED | NOT_ASSIGNED  
Update requires: No interruption

DomainIdentifier.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the group profile would be created.
DomainIdentifier.markdownDescription:
The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the group profile would be created.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^dzd[-_][a-zA-Z0-9_-]{1,36}$  
Update requires: Replacement

GroupIdentifier.markdownDescription:
The ID of the group.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: (^([0-9a-f]{10}-|)[A-Fa-f0-9]{8}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{12}$|[\p{L}\p{M}\p{S}\p{N}\p{P}\t\n\r  ]+)  
Update requires: Replacement

DomainId.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the group profile is created.
DomainId.markdownDescription:
The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the group profile is created.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^dzd[-_][a-zA-Z0-9_-]{1,36}$  
Update requires: No interruption

GroupName.description: The group-name of the Group Profile.
GroupName.markdownDescription:
The group-name of the Group Profile.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z_0-9+=,.@-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Id.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone group profile.
Id.markdownDescription:
The ID of the Amazon DataZone group profile.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^([0-9a-f]{10}-|)[A-Fa-f0-9]{8}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption
